des:
You can use this skill to listen to the Quran in an English interpretation that in a great way that keeps you focused and engaged!
You can also listen to the Quran in Arabic with English interpenetration right after for each Ayah.

# How to use it?
1. You can start by saying "Alexa start English Quran". The skill will ask you if you want the English only mode or the English and Arabic. After that it will ask you which chapter you want. 
2. The skill will remember your choice so it just run right away from next time
3. You can play a specific chapter by saying: "Alexa, ask English Quran to play chapter 3", or any number you want.
4. If you want to change the mode, you can say: "Aelxa, ask English Quran to reset"

---------------------------------------------
# Create a Routine!
A great idea is to use Alexa Routine to schedule the Quran to play early in the morning. It is a great way to wake up!
To add this skill to a daily timer, follow these steps:
1. Open your Alexa App.
2. Select Routines.
3. Select Schedule, add a time (say 7 AM).
4. Choose Skills / Your Skills.
5. Choose 'English Quran'. Done.
---------------------------------------------

Disclaimer: The content of the skill is either English only or English and Arabic based on the mode you choose.
